basic.description: A course in planetary astronomy intended for students in the life sciences, earth sciences and chemistry who have taken a suitable first-year course. Topics may include the solar system, the origin of life on Earth, other planets and planetary systems, extra-terrestrial life.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Planets and Life

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    (PHYS104 or PHYS106 or PHYS107 or PHYS117 or CHEM112) or permission of the Department.
